vista.graph
Class Schematic

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.GEContainer
          vista.graph.Schematic
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, BoundedComposite, Composite, Drawable, DrawableComposite, FontResizable, Layoutable
public class Schematic
extends GEContainer

A schematic of symbols. The schematic is a graphic element container each of whose members are arbitrary graphic elements. The layout of the elements within the container is determined by a data model. A scaled layout is used along with the information in the data model to layout the elements and display them.

Version:
$Id: Schematic.java,v 1.5 1999/12/15 16:29:11 nsandhu Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
See Also:
